title: Wagner mercenary chief calls for armed rebellion against Russian military leadership
description: Russia's Wagner mercenary group founder, Yevgeny Prigozhin, has said the Kremlin's justifications for invading Ukraine were based on lies.

title: Russian mercenary chief appears to threaten rebellion, questions invasion
description: Russia's Wagner mercenary group founder, Yevgeny Prigozhin, has said the Kremlin's justifications for invading Ukraine were based on lies.

title: Hunter Biden WhatsApp message fuels GOP assertions of corruption, even after plea
description: Hunter Biden's plea deal with the prosecutor who has been probing him has rankled numerous GOP lawmakers, who this week leveled new accusations against the Bidens.

title: Man gets life sentence for killing mail carrier who refused to deliver marijuana
description: A man who killed a U.S. Postal Service mail carrier has been sentenced to life in prison

title: Congressman wants to block US agency from slowing boats to protect endangered whales
description: A Georgia congressman wants lawmakers to block a federal agency from imposing new speed restrictions on boats and ships to protect a critically endangered whale species

title: Caterer blamed for improperly stored meat after 51 fall ill at Iowa wedding
description: More than 50 people got sick after attending an Iowa wedding, and the bride’s concerns prompted an inspection that found flaws in the way the catering restaurant stored its meat

title: 5 officers charged in Tyre Nichols' death appear in court
description: The five Memphis officers charged in Tyre Nichols' death – Tadarrius Bean, Demetrius Haley, Justin Smith, Emmitt Martin III, and Desmond Mills Jr. – appeared in court.

title: Garland responds to IRS whistleblower allegations in Hunter Biden case
description: He strongly disputed claims of political influence.

title: 3M to pay $10.3B over claims it polluted drinking water with 'forever chemicals'
description: 3M announced Thursday it agreed to pay $10.3 billion to settle lawsuits claiming it polluted drinking water with so-called "forever chemicals."

title: Infowars host Owen Shroyer pleads guilty to Capitol riot charge
description: Infowars host Owen Shroyer has pleaded guilty to joining the mob of Donald Trump supporters who rioted at the U.S. Capitol

title: A year after Roe, doctors use termination boards to provide care under abortion bans
description: Advisory boards are often determining whether doctors can provide abortions.

title: Physicians, working within tight margins, leave states with abortion bans
description: In interviews with ABC News, physicians said they decided to leave their states due to the impact abortion bans have had on their ability to practice medicine.

title: One year post-Roe, crisis pregnancy centers expand footprint in Mississippi
description: Mississippi Gov. Tate Reeves signed into law a $10 million tax credit for crisis pregnancy centers.

title: Supreme Court rejects challenge by Texas and Louisiana to Biden deportation policy
description: The court held the states lacked standing to sue the administration.

title: Heat dome to bring record temperatures in Texas
description: Texas, Arizona, New Mexico and Oklahoma are under heat alerts until next week.

title: Sub company exaggerated the details of partnerships behind the lost vessel
description: The company behind the missing Titanic tourist submersible exaggerated the details of the industry partnerships behind its titan submersible.

title: Tony-winning lyricist Sheldon Harnick 'Fiddler on the Roof' creator, dies at 99
description: Tony- and Grammy Award-winning lyricist Sheldon Harnick, who with composer Jerry Bock made up the premier musical-theater songwriting duos of the 1950s and 1960s with shows such as “Fiddler on the Roof,” “Fiorello!”

title: Clash over LBGTQ+ decor at Starbucks leads to planned strikes at more than 150 stores
description: More than 150 Starbucks stores across the country are planning to go on strike as the coffee chain and a union representing baristas got into a public dispute over displaying Pride decor in stores

title: Ohio father accused of killing his 3 young sons indicted on murder charges
description: A grand jury has indicted an Ohio man accused of fatally shooting his three young sons on murder charges

title: WATCH:  Rory McIlroy scores career-first hole-in-one
description: The PGA fan favorite scored an ace on Day One of the Travelers Championship at TPC River Highlands in Cromwell, Connecticut.

title: Martin Luther King Jr.'s granddaughter calls her picture book a 'love letter' to him
description: The 15-year-old granddaughter of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. is collaborating on a picture book tribute to the late civil rights leader and his wife, Coretta Scott King

title: Worker dead after explosion at North Carolina plant
description: Officials say a worker is dead after an explosion at a North Carolina plant

title: Andrew Tate to remain under house arrest in Romania as human trafficking case drags
description: A Romanian court has extended by 30 days the house arrest of Andrew Tate, the divisive social media personality who was charged this week with rape, human trafficking, and forming a criminal gang to sexually exploit women

title: About 350 were on migrant boat that sank off Greece, many may have died: Officials
description: Pakistan’s interior minister says an estimated 350 Pakistanis were on board an overcrowded fishing boat carrying migrants that sank off Greece last week, and that many remain missing and may have died in one of the deadliest incidents in the central Me...

title: Biden is getting endorsements from 3 abortion rights groups
description: President Joe Biden is banking on reproductive rights to be a galvanizing issue for voters in 2024

title: Exploding fire extinguisher kills student, injures 5 during Bangkok school fire drill
description: A rescuer says a fire extinguisher exploded during a high school’s annual fire drill in Bangkok, killing one student and injuring five others

title: Nearly 1.5 million pilgrims have arrived in Saudi Arabia for annual Hajj pilgrimage
description: Saudi officials say close to 1.5 million foreign pilgrims have arrived in the country so far for the annual Hajj pilgrimage

title: 3M reaches $10.3 billion settlement over contamination of water systems
description: Chemical manufacturer 3M has agreed to pay at least $10.3 billion to settle lawsuits over contamination of many U.S. public drinking water systems with potentially harmful compounds known as PFAS

title: Texas AG Ken Paxton's wife barred from voting in his impeachment trial
description: When Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton goes on trial in the state Senate after being impeached, his wife, Angela Paxton, will be barred from casting a vote

title: Why James Cameron thinks the loss of the Titan is similar to the sinking of Titanic
description: James Cameron has compared the tragic loss of the submersible Titan to the very thing that may have led the Titanic to its own demise.

title: WATCH:  Exclusive: James Cameron weighs in on sub incident
description: The film director and longtime deep-sea diver and Bob Ballard, the man who first discovered the Titanic wreckage, speak with Whit Johnson.

title: Two dead after shooting outside Florida McDonald's, police say
description: Police say two people were found dead following a shooting outside a McDonald’s restaurant in the Florida Panhandle

title: Wife of pilot in fatal sub implosion descended from couple who died on Titanic, report says
description: The wife of the man who was piloting the submersible when it imploded during this week’s dive to the the Titanic wreckage site is a descendant of a couple who died when the ocean liner sank in 1912

title: Titanic submersible: What a 'catastrophic implosion' means and what officials found
description: The five-person submersible suffered an implosion, a Coast Guard official said.

title: 'Rust' armorer Hannah Gutierrez-Reed now also facing tampering with evidence charge
description: Hannah Gutierrez-Reed, the "Rust" film set armorer charged with involuntary manslaughter, is now also being charged with tampering with evidence.
